name: Meteora DLMM Position Viewer - Product Requirements Document
description: DeFi users need a simple way to view and track their Meteora DLMM (Dynamic Liquidity Market Maker) positions across different wallets without connecting their wallets or granting permissions.

userStories.title: Manual Wallet Input for Position Viewing
userStories.description: As a liquidity provider, I want to enter my wallet address manually to view positions, so I can check my portfolio without connecting my wallet.
acceptanceCriteria: Input field accepts any valid Solana address
Shows clear error for invalid formats

userStories.title: Portfolio Summary at a Glance
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see my total portfolio value and P&L immediately after positions load, so I can quickly assess my financial status.
acceptanceCriteria: Total value in USD displayed prominently
Total P&L amount and percentage shown

userStories.title: Browse Active DLMM Positions
userStories.description: As a user, I want to browse all my Meteora DLMM positions in a list view, so I can easily scan through my liquidity positions.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows all positions in card format
Each card displays token pairs, value, and P&L

userStories.title: View Detailed Position Metrics
userStories.description: As a user, I want to expand position cards to see detailed metrics, so I can analyze individual position performance.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows: fees earned, rewards, price range, position age

userStories.title: Filter positions by Status
userStories.description: As a user, I want to filter my positions by active/inactive status, so I can focus on the most relevant positions.
acceptanceCriteria: Clear visual indication of filter applied

userStories.title: Filter by Profitability
userStories.description: As a user, I want to filter positions by profitability, so I can quickly identify underperforming positions.
acceptanceCriteria: Profitability filter with options: All, Profit, Loss

userStories.title: Manual Refresh Data
userStories.description: As a user, I want a manual refresh button to update position data, so I can get the latest information.
acceptanceCriteria: Does not clear filters or view preferences

userStories.title: Mobile Responsive View
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view my positions on mobile devices, so I can check my portfolio anywhere.

userStories.title: Error Handling and Feedback
userStories.description: As a user, I want clear error messages when things go wrong, so I understand what happened and can retry.
acceptanceCriteria: Clear message for invalid wallet addresses
